title: Frutiger? Arial?
content:
Hey, please help me guess this face!

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [red\_blue\_ad.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140821030954/http:/typophile.com/files/red_blue_ad.jpg) | 223.14 KB |
author: halloran

comments.content:
It looks Frutiger to me...

António

Frutiger has a square dot. First thought was Myriad Pro, but that lowercase e has an underbite that reminds me of Gill Sans. I'd guess this is Gill Sans Bold Condensed, perhaps beefed up a little as the r is filled in a bit.
